LightningComponentBundle.description: Custom path assistant. Provides closed steps feature

property.name: picklistField
property.label: Picklist Field
property.description: Picklist field's API name used to render the path. This field must be included in page layouts

property.name: closedOk
property.label: Closed OK step
property.description: Picklist value that represents a closed ok step. When selected will render a green progress bar.

property.name: closedKo
property.label: Closed KO step
property.description: Picklist value that represents a closed not ok step. When selected will render a red progress bar.

property.name: lastStepLabel
property.label: Label of last step
property.description: Label to give to the last step when user has to select one between Closed OK and Closed KO step.
